Literature.Title: The antimicrobial activity of hexapeptides derived from synthetic combinatorial libraries.
Literature.Author: Blondelle SE, Takahashi E, Dinh KT, Houghten RA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(IC50=10-14µg/ml),Streptococcus sanguinis ATCC 10566(IC50=14-22µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(IC50=20-21µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=15.63µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(IC50=42-45µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(IC50=70-97µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MBC=500µg/ml)
